name: Jfresolve
description: Stream and resolve external media sources directly through Jellyfin.
overview: Simplify external playback â€” Jfresolve automatically finds and streams external media from stremio.

versions.changelog: Fixed plugin image not loading: Added embedded resource for jfresolve.png and created Image endpoint to serve it. Added route handling for both /Plugins/Jfresolve/Image and /Plugins/{guid}/{version}/Image patterns.

Fixed Content-Range header handling error: Changed from Contains/GetValues to TryGetValues to properly handle Content-Range header copying without throwing InvalidOperationException. Now checks both response headers and content headers.

Fixed Jellyfin 10.11.6 compatibility: Updated NuGet packages to 10.11.6 and implemented ReattachUserDataAsync with correct signature (BaseItem, CancellationToken). This resolves the interface implementation error.
Fixed Jellyfin 10.11.6 compatibility: Improved ReattachUserDataAsync implementation using reflection with proper BindingFlags to ensure interface contract is satisfied at runtime.
Fixed Jellyfin 10.11.6 compatibility issue: Added missing ReattachUserDataAsync method implementation to ItemRepositoryDecorator using reflection for interface compatibility.

Fixed Jellyfin 10.11.6 streaming compatibility with HTTP Range request support. Added proper stream proxying with unbuffered streaming, range request handling (206 Partial Content), and improved header forwarding for FFmpeg compatibility.

Fixed Jellyfin 10.11.6 streaming compatibility by proxying streams instead of redirecting. Removed forced transcoding - now lets Jellyfin decide transcoding based on codec compatibility and client capabilities.
Fixed compatibility issues with Jellyfin 10.11.6. Updated MediaSourceManagerDecorator to use compatible method signatures.
Added failover system for dead links with configurable time windows. Code cleanup and optimization. Improved quality version support with individual stream probing.
Added new classifications for auto populate. Thanks to @Ajayrajasekaran
Code overhaul, new methods for search, save and auto populate, new instructions
Targeted library refresh after search added
Jfresolve plugin for jellyfin version 10.11.x.x - Added configurable library population scheduling, fixed plugin disposal on uninstall, improved version segmentation
